diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Acute generalized exanthematous pustulosis due to hydroxychloroquine
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient's pustular and exfoliative skin eruptions, coupled with fever and histological features observed in the skin biopsy, pointed towards acute generalized exanthematous pustulosis. The diagnosis was favored after ruling out other serious dermatological conditions such as SJS and TEN based on the presentation and findings.
